name: bj-elequ2g
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))

stmt.origin: alrimiv(s2, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1))))
stmt.pretty: alrimiv(s2, s0 = s1, (s2 ∈ s0 ↔ s2 ∈ s1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1))))
-| diffsw(s2, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1))))
-| diffsw(s2, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))
-| diffsw(s2, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))

body.origin:
|- diffsw(s2, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
-| diffsc(s2, cv(s0))
-| diffsc(s2, cv(s1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))
-| diffsc(s2, cv(s0))
-| diffsc(s2, cv(s1))

|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))
-| diffsc(s2, cv(s1))
-| diffss(s2, s0)

|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))
-| diffsc(s2, cv(s1))
-| diffss(s0, s2)

|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s2, s1)

|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s2)

comment: A form of ~ elequ2 with a universal quantifier. Its converse is ~ ax-ext . (TODO: move to main part, minimize ~ axext4 --- as of 4-Nov-2020, minimizes only ~ axext4 , by 13 bytes; and link to it in the comment of ~ ax-ext .) (Contributed by BJ, 3-Oct-2019.)
